name: RFL_CVG_BED_NUM
description: Table for the related multi Auth-Cert Bed Days Total (I RFL 8504) item - approved number of days for day type.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral ID for the referral record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated coverage in this referral record. Together with REFERRAL_ID, this forms the foreign key to the REFERRAL_CVG_BED.
